page.title: 12THE A.A. IN ERSKINE
page.content: The Automobile Association has its offices in Fanum House on the banks of the River Clyde in Erskine. It was opened in 1975. It has seventeen departments with one hundred and seventy staff. Some of these departments include travel information, public relations, legal services, insurance and breakdown services. Many of the services provided by the A.A. in Erskine cover the whole country. Other services, such as the breakdown service, are more localised. The A.A. makes good use of computers. It is testing a new computer in the breakdown department. The A.A. provides employment for some local residents.
